function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of government support for the construction sector during the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Negative impact on construction industry development and economic stability","Mitigation":"Advocacy for targeted government support and incentives for the construction sector","Technologies":"Government policies, economic stimulus packages","People":"Workers, contractors, construction companies","Owner":"Construction industry stakeholders"},{"Description":"Potential for the spread of contagious diseases at building sites","Impact":"Risk of increased transmission of contagious diseases among workers and the community","Mitigation":"Implementing strict health and safety protocols, providing personal protective equipment (PPE), promoting vaccination","Technologies":"Health screening technology, contact tracing apps, ventilation systems","People":"Workers, contractors, community members","Owner":"Construction companies, government health authorities"},{"Description":"Uncertainty about the post-COVID-19 industry condition","Impact":"Challenges in planning and decision-making for the future of the construction sector","Mitigation":"Conducting market analysis, scenario planning, and risk assessments","Technologies":"Data analytics, forecasting models, simulation software","People":"Industry analysts, business leaders, policymakers","Owner":"Construction industry associations, research organizations"}]}
